import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default class GetCars extends Component { state = { cars: [], start_date: '', end_date: '', car_class: '', queryMade: '0', show: false, car: {}, message: "" } async componentDidMount() { var res = await axios.get('http://localhost:8090/cars/getAll'); this.setState({ cars: res.data }) } render() { return (

Rental detail

Double click on the car that you would like to rent

{ this.state.cars.map(car => ( this.rentCar(car.carID)} role='button'> ) ) }
Class Brand Model Year Transmission Color Price/day
{car.carClass} {car.brand} {car.model} {car.year} {car.transmission} {car.color} {car.pricePerDay}
) }; }
